name: RingCentral Proxy
description: A lite node.js app to show how to authorize RingCentral in server side. Use cookie to authorize with client side, and proxy client-side request to RingCentral API request.

SERVER_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

APP_ORIGIN.description: The client app origin for CORS

APP_AUTH_REDIRECT.description: Redirect uri to client app after authorization in server-side
